Package com.nuecho.rivr.voicexml.rendering.voicexml.errorhandling

Classes generating VoiceXML constructs for handling fatal errors.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FatalErrorFormFactory
    Generates part of the VoiceXML document responsible for handling of VoiceXML fatal errors (error events that can't be handle by the HTTP server).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExitFatalErrorFormFactory
    FatalErrorFormFactory generating an empty <exit> element.
    ReturnFatalErrorFormFactory
    FatalErrorFormFactory generating an empty <return> element.

Package com.nuecho.rivr.voicexml.rendering.voicexml.errorhandling Description

Classes generating VoiceXML constructs for handling fatal errors.
